article_title: Tax Extenders Bill Stalled In Senate

article_metadata.description: Remember that Tax Extenders Bill that seemed to be moving ahead? Consider it stalled. Amid a flurry of proposed amendments to the bill, Sen. Harry Reid (D-NV) moved to consider a cloture motion on Amendment No. 3060 to H.R. 3474. H.R. 3474 is the Hire More Heroes Act, originally intended "o [...]
article_metadata.author: Kelly Phillips Erb
